entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Bracebridge
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:30 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -14.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Muskoka Airport 05:48 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -14.0°C
Pressure: 102.2 kPa
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 82 %
Wind Chill: -21
Dewpoint: -16.4°C
Wind: S 13 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 5.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy with risk of snow squalls. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this morning then becoming west 20 gusting to 40 late this afternoon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 21 this morning and minus 10 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries at times heavy. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls early this evening. Local amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Wind becoming southwest 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Risk of snow squalls in the afternoon. Local blowing snow in the afternoon. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 in the afternoon. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 15 in the morning and minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:38 AM EST Wednesday 01 February 2023
